summary: Entrepreneurial journey as Owner of Staff Burger, steering the ship from October 2020 to February 2022 in Porto Alegre, RS, Brazil. I was responsible for the whole business, from the conception of the idea to the execution.

At Picanha Catering in Luxembourg, I served as an assistant from July 2018 to August 2019, overseeing seamless event organization, providing dedicated customer support, efficiently troubleshooting issues, and assisting in strategic procurement of essential supplies.

As a Technical Support professional at Contax in Porto Alegre, RS, Brazil, I excelled in addressing critical customer issues previously handled by other departments. I engaged in direct communication with managers and leaders of technical teams in the serviced regions, while monitoring and resolving critical and impactful cases.
